duties_responsibilities.duty: Install, maintain, and repair telecommunications equipment, including fiber optic networks and cell sites.
Work as part of a team to complete construction projects within designated timelines and quality standards.
Follow safety protocols and adhere to company policies to ensure a safe working environment for yourself and your colleagues.
Travel to different locations as required to fulfill project requirements.
Operate heavy machinery and equipment to carry out construction and installation tasks.

education_certification.credential: Valid driver’s license with MVR printout
